name: Mind Match Game
description: A fun remake of the card game Concentration. You'll get seconds to commit the matches to memory, and then seconds to match. Each level brings less time to memorize. Can you find all the matches? Your score increases the quicker you find all the matches and multiplies by the level. Focus! Test your memory. 10 levels to master. Exercise your mind (and your brain!). Download now! Game Center enabled - compete worldwide for the highest score!
